greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of 1/(g(1)-g(2)+g(4)-g(5)), where g(k) = sum(1/(6*m+k)^2,m=0..infinity).
reference: L. Fejes Toth, Lagerungen in der Ebene, auf der Kugel und im Raum, 2nd. ed., Springer-Verlag, Berlin, Heidelberg 1972; see p. 213.
mathematica: g[k_] := PolyGamma[1, k/6]/36; RealDigits[ 1/(g[1] - g[2] + g[4] - g[5]), 10, 99] // First (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 13 2013 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 31 2003
